div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 631 Furculesti, c. 21 km. SW of Alex- andria, Rumania, 1958 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 21 AR Maroneia: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 20 spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) Iliescu, Caiet selectiv 2 (1961), pp. 658-62
